greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function of squarefree numbers squared (A062503).
comment: a(n) = A008966(A037213(n)), when assumed A008966(0) = 0. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 07 2013
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
formula: Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(2s)/zeta(4s) = prod[prime p: 1+p^(-2s) ], see A008966.
Multiplicative with a(p^e) = 1 if e=2, a(p^e) = 0 if e=1 or e>2. - _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 28 2017
example: a(3) = 0 because 3 is not the square of a squarefree number.
a(4) = 1 because sqrt(4) = 2, a squarefree number.
program: a227291 n = fromEnum $ (sum $ zipWith (*) mds (reverse mds)) == 1
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Jul 05 2013
